library

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • library.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all the menu prints and user prompts in order to use the system.
    Version:
    1.0 Created: Simple prints that displayed the different menu sections., 1.1 Modification: added a localDate parameter in the method signature so that the current date is visible at each menu print. Additionally, added a date formatter that takes given date and prints it out in "Weekday-Month-calendar day-year" to facilitate user (less numbers, easier to read), 1.2 Modification: Added a "customer extra features" menu
    Author:
    Oliver Manzi
